ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from updating a Reference PAC record when the Follow Up Date value is prior to the current date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), ( Follow_Up_Date__c < TODAY() ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot update this record when the Follow Up Date is prior to today.
